# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. This product is truly a masterpiece and holds great significance to us. Given its unique features and the quality it offers, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering the cost of production and the value it brings, I am offering you the chance to own this product for $200. I trust that you will find immense value in it and appreciate its worth. Thank you for considering my offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
